"Ilma": "The Lecielans have been saying that they lost some data."
"I searched everywhere, but not all of it was able to be recovered."
"It seems I've still got a ways to go."
"Hold on a sec. I'm going to use your Mag to collect data..."

"There it is. So it was being blocked from here...
No wonder we weren't able to find it..."
"Adding this to our data should allow us to continue a bunch of research."
"Really, you have no idea how big of a help this is."
"Anyways, I'm-- Oh! If you don't mind, could you stop in by the Lodge before you return?"
"I think Meri and the others would be glad to see you."
